name: John Digger Steel Commando
description:
John Digger Steel Commando is one of the best action and shooting game.

John Digger, a super soldier, needs to complete his mission and save the world. He will face many challenges along the way. Equip powerful weapons along with skills, John Digger - Steel Commando Leader must cross from Storm Desert to Silent Forest to complete the mission.

GAME FEATURES & GAMEPLAY:

● Collect gold to upgrade weapons, skills and character

● Destroy the enemies and fight the massive Rambo Boss

● Complete the mission to get reward items such as gems, weapons, and gold

● Cross 3 campaign maps(Storm Desert, Mutant Lab, Silent Forest) and 24 stages

● Powerful weapons, guns, and shot preview

● Achievement and Daily reward

John Digger Steel Commando - Shooting Game 2023.

Are you ready to save the world?

Install and play the best action games now!
